name: GMail &other Google logins styled as Google Search
description: This alters the GMail, YouTube, Google Docs, Google Calender, and all other Google login screens, and makes them look like Google Search, (see picture entitled "Image with the style") without limiting the functionality. Logically, the left side of the search bar is for your username, and the right for your password. As soon as you click the box, the two sides become obvious, so it's not confusing (as in the main picture). Google don't put the topbar on their login screens, so it is just for show, and doesn't actually work as it usually does. The topbar links to the 'Forgot your Password' page. This doesn't remove adverts or anything else; it only edits the login screen. Check out my other styles, share this if you like it, and enjoy!

user.name: _Dinesh_
user.about: I don't usually code in CSS, but I need some form of entertainment sometimes.

additional_info:
I strongly dislike Google, and I don't want to encourage the use of their products, however, I have created this because I know that a lot of people do use their products.

This has only been tested by me logging in and out on my Firefox, so if there are problems, feel free to leave feedback or fix them yourself, but I don't believe there are any. I haven't tested this for older versions of Firefox, but I expect it will still work. I haven't tested this on Chrome, but it probably will still work too.
